Package eu.datacrop.maize.model_repository.mongodb.converters

Class SystemConvertersImpl

java.lang.Object
eu.datacrop.maize.model_repository.mongodb.converters.SystemConvertersImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
SystemConverters
@Service public class SystemConvertersImpl extends Object implements SystemConverters
This auxiliary class performs transformations among MongoDb Location database entities and data transfer objects.
Since:
version 0.3.0
Author:
Angela-Maria Despotopoulou [Athens, Greece]

  • Method Details

    • convertRequestDtoToEntity

      public System convertRequestDtoToEntity(SystemRequestDto dto, String databaseID) throws IllegalArgumentException
      This method transforms a System Request Data Transfer Object into its respective MongoDB Entity form. Returns null on erroneous input.
      Specified by:
      convertRequestDtoToEntity in interface SystemConverters
      Parameters:
      dto - The data transfer object to transform, not null.
      databaseID - UUID that uniquely identifies a persisted System, receives value only on update requests.
      Returns:
      The result of the transformation.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if dto parameter is null.

    • convertEntityToResponseWrapper

      public SystemResponseWrapper convertEntityToResponseWrapper(System entity) throws IllegalArgumentException
      This method transforms a System MongoDB Entity into its respective Request Data Transfer Response form. The result is enclosed in a Wrapper object. Returns null on erroneous input.
      Specified by:
      convertEntityToResponseWrapper in interface SystemConverters
      Parameters:
      entity - The database entity to transform, not null.
      Returns:
      The result of the transformation.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if entity parameter is null.

    • convertEntitiesToResponseWrapper

      public SystemResponsesWrapper convertEntitiesToResponseWrapper(List<System> entitiesList, PaginationInfo paginationInfo) throws IllegalArgumentException
      This method transforms a collection of System MongoDB Entities into its respective collection of Request Data Transfer Responses form. The result is enclosed in a Wrapper object. Returns null on erroneous input.
      Specified by:
      convertEntitiesToResponseWrapper in interface SystemConverters
      Parameters:
      entitiesList - The list of database entities to transform, not null, not empty.
      paginationInfo - A structure containing information regarding pagination, not null.
      Returns:
      The result of the transformation.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if entitiesList parameter is null or corresponds to an empty list.
      IllegalArgumentException - if paginationInfo parameter is null.

    • synthesizeResponseWrapperForError

      public SystemResponseWrapper synthesizeResponseWrapperForError(ResponseCode code, String message, SystemErrorMessages errorMessage) throws IllegalArgumentException
      This method synthesizes a Wrapper object with error messages. To be used when database transactions fail. Wrapper for a single entity version.
      Specified by:
      synthesizeResponseWrapperForError in interface SystemConverters
      Parameters:
      code - Code indicating why the database transaction has been unsuccessful, not null.
      message - Comment accompanying the error report, not null.
      errorMessage - A code for the particular type of error, not null.
      Returns:
      The result of the transformation.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if code parameter is null, or equals to SUCCESS or UNDEFINED.
      IllegalArgumentException - if message parameter is null or an empty string.

    • synthesizeResponsesWrapperForError

      public SystemResponsesWrapper synthesizeResponsesWrapperForError(ResponseCode code, String message, SystemErrorMessages errorMessage) throws IllegalArgumentException
      This method synthesizes a Wrapper object with error messages. To be used when database transactions fail. Wrapper for collection version.
      Specified by:
      synthesizeResponsesWrapperForError in interface SystemConverters
      Parameters:
      code - Code indicating why the database transaction has been unsuccessful, not null.
      message - Comment accompanying the error report, not null.
      errorMessage - A code for the particular type of error, not null.
      Returns:
      The result of the transformation.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if code parameter is null, or equals to SUCCESS or UNDEFINED.
      IllegalArgumentException - if message parameter is null or an empty string.
